a smile grew across his face "REALLY, KAKASHI-SENSEI?" the genin asked, Kakashi nodded, and with that, Naruto ran off towards resturant, leaving his masked teacher behind.

-------------------

10 minutes and 13 bowls later, Naruto leaned back and sighed, "THAT WAS GREAT!" he said patting his bloated stomach.

"Naruto, you sure you sholdn't go on a diet?" Kakashi asked, Naruto gave his teacher a look of confusion, "Why would you say that?"

"Because, youve put on a few pounds." Kakashi said, poking Naruto's belly, "Really," Naruto looked down at his fat belly, it was soft and warm, "Well, i like it so there, and you know what, IM GOING TO PROVE TO YOU THAT WEIGHT ON A NINJA DOESN'T MATTER, old man, 2 bowls of your fattest ramen!!!"

Kakashi smiled behind mask, he decided to keep an eye on his now weight obbsesed student.

--------------------

1111.content:
Naruto stared at the note intently. A huge grin stretched it's way into his chubby cheeks.

"Naruto," it read. "I'm really impressed by how hard you're working. I didn't think you would go so far. Meet me at the ramen shack in 4 days, but only if you weigh at least 200 pounds. - Kakashi."

"200 pounds? That's 50 pounds in 4 days!" Naruto rubbed his jiggly belly. He wasn't full anymore.
"Wait.. I wonder if I put on any weight last night?" Naruto wondered.

He cheerily hopped out of bed. His scale was right where he'd left it yesterday. He stepped on the scale. The pointer spun a few times and finally stopped on 160 lbs.

"Wow, 10 pounds in one night!" he said excitedly. "This'll be too easy!"

Naruto's stomach let out a low growling noise. "Can't forget to eat!" he said with a few pats on the stomach. He noticed how soft his belly felt. He actually like the feel of it.

Naruto ate as much food as he could, then used his shadow clone technique he'd developed to help him eat even more.
His belly was hard and round from all the food packed tightly in it. His clones rubbed his belly as he relaxed with a smile. Even though he'd just gotten up, he felt so full, and he slowly dosed off.

Naruto woke up to a counter filled with massive ammounts of food. Ramen, rice cakes, regular cakes; all of his favorites, all of them fattening. Naruto leaped forward and began shoving it all into his mouth. "I don't know where I am, mmmh, but I don't care. This is the best!" he said with a moth full of food. He just kept eating, and eating. He never felt full, the food never seemed to end. It was lie heaven. Naruto reached down to feel his belly and see if his belly felt full, but instead of a hard, round, full belly, his hand met a soft, jiggly mound of flesh.

Naruto, surprised at this, looked down at his belly. It was huge! His breasts were sagging and laying comfortably on his belly, which was resting between his thighs on the floor. He stood up and grabbed the huge mass of flesh. He couldn't even see his feet.

"Wha-what the hell is going on?" he said frantically. He hadn't realized just how much he'd eaten. He stared down long and hard at his belly, all the while holding it in his arms.

And, he liked it.

A lot.

Naruto heard a crash and flung up. He looked from left to right, and realized that he'd been dreaming.
"Dammit!" he said loudly. He looked around to see what he'd heard. A few dishes had fallen in his sink.

It had all been a dream.

"But it felt so good.." he mumbled to himself. He picked up the note from Kakashi, and read it once more.

"Maybe I should gain more than 40 pounds, maybe 60, or 70.. but what if I put on too much?" he argued to himself. "It felt so nice... but then what if Kakashi gets mad..?"
Naruto thought to himself for hourse. finally, he decided...

After a few moments of waiting, the scale finally stopped, landing on the number 170. Naruto grinned victoriously as he pumped his fist in the air.

"Haha, take THAT! 50 pounds in one week! That's gotta be a new record!" he cheered happily. Kakashi was shocked, his single visible eye wide open. How had he gained that much weight in so little time? Something about his rapid gain seemed.....unnatural, to say the least. Naruto had stopped prancing long enough to notice his sensei's strange stare.

"Hey, Kakashi-sensei, why are you staring at me like that?" he asked, slightly disturbed. The silver-haired Jonin seemed to be awakened from his stupor by the blonde's question.

"Oh, I was just wondering if you would come with me real quick. It'll only take a few minutes." he said. Naruto seemed surprised at this request.

"What are we gonna do, sensei? Is it some kind of super-secret training?!" he asked excitedly. Kakashi lazily dismissed his student's curiosity.

"I guess you could consider it that. I'll let you decide for yourself." he said, walking towards the door. Naruto waddled quickly behind, his body still adjusting to his newfound weight.

"H-Hey wait up Kakashi-sensei!" he cried out, though his cries fell on deaf eyes. His sensei was already out the door.


It was a beautiful day in Konoha, a perfect day to just sit back and enjoy all life has to offer. Calm, quiet, peaceful.....

"DAMMIT WHERE THE HELL IS HE!?!?"

....Well, kind of.....

Naruto stomped down the dirt path, a look of extreme anger on his chubby face.

"The nerve of that guy! Inviting me for a walk, then disappearing without a trace! Gah, I can't STAND him sometimes!" he complained in anger. Paying no mind to where he was going, he bumped into the object of his anger.

"Oh, Naruto. You're a little late." Kakashi said nonchalantly, his face hidden behind his infamous orange book. Smoke could be seen billowing out from Naruto's ears.

"You damn son of a -" a quick hush from Kakashi cut off his incensed rant before it could begin.

"Listen, there's something that's been bothering me lately and it concerns you." he said. Naruto looked at him confusedly.

"There is? What is it?" he asked innocently, with the look of a young child in his face.

"It's just how dedicated you are to gaining weight. I don't want you neglecting your training or your other duties as a shinobi as well." he stated plainly. Naruto smirked knowingly.

"Ah, don't worry about that! I've been using my shadow clones to train and do missions around the village while I gained at home! It's not like I didn't think about that beforehand!" he replied, smiling at his resourcefulness. Kakashi sighed. This was not the way this conversation was supposed to go. Apparently, he'd have to wait a little longer before any hard evidence came up.

"Well then, I suppose my concerns were unfounded. If that's it, then I'll just be going now. I need to see the Hokage about something. See ya." he said. Before his student could complain, he disappeared in a puff of smoke, leaving a frustrated Naruto alone.

"Ugh, I will NEVER understand that guy!" he shouted. With a reluctant sigh, he turned back to his apartment, hoping to maybe eat a little bit more before he had to turn in.


Tsunade's paperwork seemed to be neverending. The blonde Hokage slammed her head on her desk in frustration. Why did she agree to this again? Well, there was Nawaki, Dan, Jiraiya, Sarutobi-sensei, Shizune, Naruto......Okay, enough of that guilt trip. She settled instead for silently praying for something to happen.

Someone must've heard her, for Kakashi entered the room with a stern look in his eye.

"Tsunade-sama, we need to talk." he started. She looked up curiously.

"Oh? About what?" she asked nonchalantly.

'It's about Naruto." he replied. With that, Tsunade instantly gave him his undivided attention.

"I'm all ears."


Naruto had just finished emptying his cabinet of food, his stomach bloated from the gorging. With a final belch, he sighed in relief as he felt the food finally begin to digest.

"Ohh.....maybe I overdid it a bit...." he admitted, feeling somewhat queasy. He decided to check to see how much he weighted after that. Hopefully getting this slight case of indigestion would pay off....

The scale tipped, finally revealing his weight to be 183 lbs. He was somewhat surprised with the results. He felt he had eaten a lot more. Ah well, he'd just have to wait for the food to settle before he checked again. With that done, he changed into his new larger pajamas and fell quickly to sleep.


Tsunade sighed in frustration. Was that the case with Naruto? Somehow, it didn't surprise her in the least.

"Kakashi, keep an eye on him. Thank you for bringing it to my attention. We may need to help the process along to find out exactly what's going on." she ordered. Kakashi nodded and disappeared in a puff of smoke. With him gone, she opened a nearby drawer and pulled out a top-secret manila folder with many papers flowing out of it. She opened it carefully and looked at the top page.

"I wonder.....could this be it?" she asked herself.


In the night, a mysterious shadow watched the sleeping Naruto with a cheerful grin. The plan was working perfectly, and the blonde's interest in gaining weight only helped the process. With a small chuckle, it left, waiting to see the fruits of its hard-thought-out plot.
